commit_message:
docs: Update comprehensive documentation for security layer and hostile testing framework

- Updated MODULE_GUIDE.md with security and credential management sections
- Enhanced TROUBLESHOOTING.md with credential and security diagnostics
- Updated CLAUDE.md to reflect production-ready security layer
- Added complete hostile testing framework documentation
- Updated system architecture diagrams for current modular structure

Security features documented:
- Multi-backend credential management (1Password + Keychain)
- Hostile testing framework with 38 comprehensive tests
- Zero information disclosure security model
- Production deployment security gates
- Comprehensive security troubleshooting guides
